name: Gumball Panic
description:
You are an OUT OF CONTROL gumball machine being attacked in a nondescript, lawsuit-proof, non-brand-affiliated children's arcade and pizzeria.

  • WASD to move
  • Projectiles happen automatically as you spin
  • Click to slow-down and increase rate of fire
  • Careful! If you run out of slow-down you'll be stuck with no movement

Made by GooseRocketGames

Clark (Also happy birthday Clark)

[Chev] Ron Pink
